author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MARIO CONTINUES MOVING WEST-NORTHWESTWARD FARTHER AWAY FROM SOCORRO ISLAND...
summary: ...MARIO CONTINUES MOVING WEST-NORTHWESTWARD FARTHER AWAY FROM SOCORRO ISLAND... As of 8:00 AM MST Mon Sep 15 the center of Mario was located near 20.0, -113.2 with movement WNW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 995 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...MARIO CONTINUES MOVING WEST-NORTHWESTWARD FARTHER AWAY FROM SOCORRO ISLAND... As of 8:00 AM MST Mon Sep 15 the center of Mario was located near 20.0, -113.2 with movement WNW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 995 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Mario (EP3/EP132025)
